{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=SBG7400 |revision=-AC2 |series=AC2400 |asin= |price=200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |fcc_date=03/24/2017 |fcc_id=UIDSBG7400 |pcb_id=ARCT04799 |type=wireless router, cable modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel Puma |cpu1_model= |fla1= |ram1= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=Digital Cable Front-End Receiver;MaxLinear;MxL265;MXL265D, XNIQN.01, 1692 BC;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, DFS (master) |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''AC2400 '' class'''
{{TagLine|SURFboard Cable Modem and Wi-Fi Router}} :''with ARRIS Secure Home Internet by McAfee'' :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/wi-fi-cable-modems/sbg7400ac2/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Arris|p=a0h0c00000Ut0vVAAR}} "ARCT04799 REV B" is silkscreened on the bottom of the board. *The FCC UNII-1 Test Report says, :''"SBG7400x is identical to TG2482 except no telephony circuitry.'' :The TG2482 is Telephony Gateway with Dual Band Wireless radios; :3x3 2.4GHz 802.11n and 4x4 5GHz 802.11ac Wave 2" DOCSIS 3.0 24x8{{CableModemSpec |down_c=24 |up_c=8 }} ===See also=== :;[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] • [[Arris]] *[[Arris SBG7400-AC2]] • [[Arris TG2482]] *[[Arris SBG6950-AC2]] • [[Arris TG1692]] *[[Arris TG1672G]] - [[Intel Puma]] DHCE2612 *[[Arris TG1682G]] - [[Intel Puma]] DHCE2652 *[[Arris TG3482G]] - [[Intel Puma]] FHCE2712 *[[Arris TG3482ER]] - [[Intel Puma]] FHCE2712 [[Category:Fix Me!]]
